sn37.2:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato puriso ekantaamanapo hoti matugamassa.
sn37.2:1.3: Na ca rupava hoti, na ca bhogava hoti, na ca silava hoti, alaso ca hoti, pajancassa na labhati—
sn37.2:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato puriso ekantaamanapo hoti matugamassa.
sn37.2:1.5: Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato puriso ekantamanapo hoti matugamassa.
sn37.2:1.7: Rupava ca hoti, bhogava ca hoti, silava ca hoti, dakkho ca hoti analaso, pajancassa labhati—
sn37.2:1.8: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato puriso ekantamanapo hoti matugamassa”ti.
